Title: Stand by Me
Plot: After learning that a boy their age has been accidentally killed near their rural homes, four Oregon boys decide to go see the body. On the way, Gordie,  Vern, Chris and Teddy encounter a mean junk man and a marsh full of leeches, as they also learn more about one another and their very different home lives. Just a lark at first, the boys' adventure evolves into a defining event in their lives.
Tagline: For some, it's the last real taste of innocence, and the first real taste of life.
Stars: Wil Wheaton, River Phoenix, Corey Feldman
